headerText: The `v-btn-toggle` component is a simple wrapper for `v-item-group` built specifically to work with `v-btn`.

usage.desc: Toggle buttons are essentially styled radio or checkboxes, but for any element.

appBar.desc: Easily integrate customized button solutions with a `v-toolbar`

qwerty.desc: Group similar actions and design your own WYSIWYG component.

togglePictures.desc: Icons can be used as toggle buttons when they allow selection, or deselection, of a single choice, such as marking an item as a favorite.
